long.ar,ca,cs,el,fa,fi,gu,hu,id,it,ko,ms,nl,p:
FireShot takes full web page screenshots. You can edit and annotate captures. 

You can capture web pages entirely to PDF (with links) / JPEG / PNG files, print, or copy to clipboard. The screenshots are instant, stored locally, and produce no traffic. FireShot can work offline.

* NEW: send screenshots directly to Gmail.

"The Best Free Google Chrome Extension" by PCMAG.COM.


### What you can do with FireShot:

âœ“ Capture full web pages entirely
âœ“ Capture only visible part of the page
âœ“ Capture selection
âœ“ Save screenshot to disk as PDF (with links), PNG, and JPEG
âœ“ Copy screenshot to clipboard
âœ“ Print web page screenshots

### A FREE upgrade is available. Activate it directly from the menu and:

âœ“ Save screenshot to PDF files with direct links
âœ“ Capture specific elements, such as scrolling areas on web pages
âœ“ Capture all tabs in one click and save to single PDF
âœ“ Edit screenshot: crop, resize, add text and arrow annotations, blur areas and apply other effects
âœ“ Send to OneNote (Pro version)
âœ“ Print
âœ“ Save captures to disk as PDF, PNG, GIF, JPEG, BMP
âœ“ Upload to Twitter, Google Picasa, Facebook, ImageShack, Flickr, EasyCaptures
âœ“ Copy screenshots to clipboard
âœ“ Print
âœ“ E-Mail
âœ“ Export captures to external editor

long.pt_BR:
FireShot takes full web page screenshots. You can edit and annotate captures. 

You can capture web pages entirely to PDF (with links) / JPEG / PNG files, print, or copy to clipboard. FireShot can work offline.

* NEW: send screenshots directly to Gmail.

"The Best Free Google Chrome Extension" by PCMAG.COM.

The screenshots are instant and produce no traffic. 

### What you can do with FireShot:

âœ“ Capture full web pages entirely
âœ“ Capture only visible part of the page
âœ“ Capture selection
âœ“ Save screenshot to disk as PDF (with links), PNG, and JPEG
âœ“ Copy screenshot to clipboard
âœ“ Print screenshot

### A FREE upgrade is available. Activate it directly from the menu and:

âœ“ Capture specific elements, such as scrolling areas on web pages
âœ“ Capture all tabs in one click and save to single PDF
âœ“ Edit screenshot: crop, resize, add text and arrow annotations, blur areas and apply other effects
âœ“ Print
âœ“ Save screenshot to PDF files
âœ“ Save captures to disk as PDF, PNG, GIF, JPEG, BMP
âœ“ Send to OneNote (Pro version)
âœ“ Upload to Twitter, Google Picasa, Facebook, ImageShack, Flickr, EasyCaptures
âœ“ Copy screenshot to clipboard
âœ“ Print screenshot
âœ“ E-Mail
âœ“ Export to external editor
